name: @redhat/osl-management-console-image
description: Red Hat OpenShift Serverless Logic Management Console Image

scripts.build:dev: pnpm cleanup && pnpm env-json:schema:generate && pnpm copy:assets && run-script-if --bool "$(build-env containerImages.build)" --then "pnpm image:cekit:build"
scripts.build:prod: pnpm cleanup && pnpm env-json:schema:generate && pnpm copy:assets && run-script-if --bool "$(build-env containerImages.build)" --then "pnpm image:cekit:build"
scripts.image:cekit:build:linux:darwin: pnpm image:cekit:copy && pnpm image:cekit:cache:artifacts && pnpm image:cekit:setup:env make -C ./generated build
scripts.image:cekit:build:win32: echo "Build skipped on macOS and Windows"
scripts.image:cekit:copy: rsync -av --include='modules/kogito-system-user' --include='modules/kogito-project-versions' --exclude='modules/kogito-*' --include='*'  node_modules/@kie-tools/sonataflow-image-common/resources/ generated/ && cp -R resources/* ./generated/ && pnpm image:cekit:copy-modules
scripts.image:cekit:setup:env: . ./node_modules/@kie-tools/python-venv/venv/bin/activate && cross-env SWF_IMAGE_REGISTRY=$(build-env sonataflowManagementConsoleImageEnv.registry) SWF_IMAGE_REGISTRY_ACCOUNT=$(build-env sonataflowManagementConsoleImageEnv.account) SWF_IMAGE_NAME=$(build-env sonataflowManagementConsoleImageEnv.name) SWF_IMAGE_TAG=$(build-env sonataflowManagementConsoleImageEnv.buildTag) QUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) KOGITO_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version) SONATAFLOW_MANAGEMENT_CONSOLE_PORT=$(build-env sonataflowManagementConsoleImageEnv.port)
